import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../Components/FormContainer' //import { savePaymentMethod } from '../Actions/cartActions' import CheckoutSteps from '../Components/CheckoutSteps' function Paymentscreen({ history }) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const [paymentMethod,setPaymentMethod] = useState() if(!shippingAddress.address){ history.push("/shipping") } function submitHandler(e){ e.preventDefault() console.log(paymentMethod) } const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>
